title: Pixarra TwistedBrush Pro Studio 22.02 [deepstatus]
description:
Pixarra TwistedBrush Pro Studio 22.02 [deepstatus]

        TwistedBrush has more than 5,000 brushes available,
        along with all the features that artists love to use:
        layers, realistic media, photo cloning, tracing, masks,
        particles, filters, script recording, scripts to AVI,
        drawing tablet support, brush shapes, patterns, textures,
        Adobe compatible plug-in support, integrated scanner support,
        image brushes, drawing guides, reference image views,
        dirty brushes, scratch layer, dynamic palettes
        and a whole lot more.

        TwistedBrush Pro Studio runs on all versions of the Windows
        operating system and is designed for all realms of digital art
        including natural media fine art, photo retouching,
        photo composition, photo cloning to turn your photos into the
        look of hand painted artwork, mandala art, patterns, manga,
        even 3D like painting with the incredible blob modeling tools.


        New in 22.02

     Added - Load and Save functionality added to the Bezier Curve tool.

     Added - Mask Feather added to the Mask menu

     Added - Mask Filter added to the Mask menu

     Improved - The Scratch Layer now supports undos.

    Improved - When using the Animation Controller in Edit Mode
                masks will be retained across pages.

     Improved - The number of Pages per Book has been increased to 5000.
                This also allows for 5x longer animations to be created.

     Changed - The filters Painted, Illustrated, Skin Enhance and
               Frame Maker were changed to disable and ignore the
               current mask. This was done to avoid cases where a
               disabled mask was re-enabled after the filter usage.

     Changed - In the Animation Control diagram the Flatten Layer
               button is now called Flatten.

     Fixed - Brushes with the Blend Mix Underlayer or
             Blend Mix Underlayer effects did not work on the Scratch Layer.

     Fixed - When loading, reseting or creating a new palette the old
             palette file was not deleted.

     Fixed - Creating palette from Image was not working correctly.
             Now the Page View panel is automatically shown and the palette
             is generated from that view.

     Fixed - The Tile X and Tile Y brush control effects defaulted
             to unexpected values.

     Fixed - The first use of Pro Presets could result
             in an empty ArtSet list.



     [INSTALLATION]



        - Unrar with you favorite archiver, such as WinRar

        - Install.

        - Insert a very boring serial.

        - Ok, It's Activated!
